data.lyric:
[ti:Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:Snoopy's Christmas - Comedy Favourites]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.69]Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer - Gene Autry
[00:01.90]Composed by：J D Marks
[00:03.09]
[00:05.12]You know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen
[00:09.28]
[00:09.99]Comet and Cupid and Donner and Blitzen
[00:13.69]
[00:14.44]But do you recall
[00:18.54]The most famous reindeer of all
[00:25.32]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
[00:28.17]
[00:28.72]Had a very shiny nose
[00:32.50]And if you ever saw it
[00:35.80]You would even say it glows
[00:39.75]All of the other reindeer
[00:43.46]Used to laugh and call him names
[00:47.06]They never let poor Rudolph
[00:50.07]
[00:50.77]Join in any reindeer games
[00:54.68]Then one foggy christmas Eve
[00:58.02]Santa came to say
[01:01.23]
[01:01.89]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[01:05.43]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[01:08.90]Then how the reindeer loved him
[01:11.87]
[01:12.43]As they shouted out with glee
[01:16.17]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
[01:19.64]You'll go down in history
[01:22.93]
[01:52.68]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
[01:55.45]
[01:56.19]Had a very shiny nose
[01:59.67]And if you ever saw it
[02:02.84]
[02:03.41]You would even say it glows
[02:06.98]All of the other reindeer
[02:09.91]
[02:10.71]Used to laugh and call him names
[02:14.42]They never let poor Rudolph
[02:17.39]
[02:18.11]Join in any reindeer games
[02:21.74]Then one foggy christmas Eve
[02:25.58]Santa came to say
[02:28.28]
[02:29.07]Rudolph with your nose so bright
[02:32.68]Won't you guide my sleigh tonight
[02:36.37]Then how the reindeer loved him
[02:39.21]
[02:40.02]As they shouted out with glee
[02:43.26]
[02:43.82]Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer
[02:47.42]You'll go down in history
data.trans:
[ti:Rudolph The Red-Nosed Reindeer]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:Snoopy's Christmas - Comedy Favourites]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.69]//
[00:01.90]//
[00:03.09]
[00:05.12]你认识Dasher和Dancer 也知道Prancer和Vixen
[00:09.28]
[00:09.99]了解Comet和Cupid 以及Donner和Blitzen
[00:13.69]
[00:14.44]你是否会想起
[00:18.54]最出名的驯鹿
[00:25.32]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[00:28.17]
[00:28.72]有个闪亮的鼻子
[00:32.50]如果你看到了
[00:35.80]就知道它会闪闪发光
[00:39.75]所有其他的驯鹿
[00:43.46]过去大家常常嘲笑他还给他起绰号
[00:47.06]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph
[00:50.07]
[00:50.77]从不让他参与任何驯鹿游戏
[00:54.68]之后在一个雾蒙蒙的平安夜
[00:58.02]圣诞老人降临
[01:01.23]
[01:01.89]他说Rudolph的鼻子闪闪发亮
[01:05.43]今晚为我拉雪橇如何
[01:08.90]所有的驯鹿都喜欢他了
[01:11.87]
[01:12.43]他们一边大声地欢唱
[01:16.17]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[01:19.64]你将名垂青史
[01:22.93]
[01:52.68]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[01:55.45]
[01:56.19]有个闪亮的鼻子
[01:59.67]如果你看到了
[02:02.84]
[02:03.41]就知道它会闪闪发光
[02:06.98]所有其他的驯鹿
[02:09.91]
[02:10.71]过去大家常常嘲笑他还给他起绰号
[02:14.42]嫌弃可怜的Rudolph
[02:17.39]
[02:18.11]从不让他参与任何驯鹿游戏
[02:21.74]之后在一个雾蒙蒙的平安夜
[02:25.58]圣诞老人降临
[02:28.28]
[02:29.07]他说Rudolph的鼻子闪闪发亮
[02:32.68]今晚为我拉雪橇如何
[02:36.37]所有的驯鹿都喜欢他了
[02:39.21]
[02:40.02]他们一边大声地欢唱
[02:43.26]
[02:43.82]红鼻子的驯鹿Rudolph
[02:47.42]你将名垂青史
